channel.title: Help - Glitch or Bug

item.title: Help - Glitch or Bug
item.dc:creator: @DuhPk DuhPk
item.description:
@DuhPk wrote:

[quote=“tannerj55, post:5, topic:357699”][quote author=DuhPk link=topic=454213.msg3326373#msg3326373 date=1283131843]

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("theive")){ //Voule Command Generator if(playerLevel[17] == 1) { sendMessage("You start with a automatic 61 Theiving"); addSkillXP((308288), 17); teleportToX = 2662; teleportToY = 3307; } else if (playerLevel[17] >= 61) { sendMessage("You already have 61 theiving, you do not gain anything.."); sendMessage("You Teleport to the @red@~Ardougne theving area~"); sendMessage("Theive the Stalls for EXP and some Moneyz"); sendMessage("This area is still in @red@BETA, @blu@Please report any Bugs using ::suggest."); teleportToX = 2662; teleportToY = 3307; } }

Replace your whole command with this one and save & compile. There ya go.
[/quote]

Thanks very much mate. Now I can use that template for other teleports :D[/quote]

No problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Help - Glitch or Bug

item.description:
@tannerj55 wrote:

iCreatedHorror:

With the else statement in a command, anytime you do a command you will get that message, no matter what.

Is there someway I can get the same functionality with a different word or something, because I a complete beginner with coding haha.

item.title: Help - Glitch or Bug
item.dc:creator: @tannerj55 tannerj55
item.description:
@tannerj55 wrote:

Alright, I recently created a command in which it teleports you to the thieving area. But if you have exactly one thieving, you get 300,228 EXP, if you don’t you gain nothing.

But lately I’ve been having this problem.

No matter what command I do, The text pops up for that command and its really pissing me off…

heres the command code:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("theive")){ //Voule Command Generator teleportToX = 2662; teleportToY = 3307;} if(playerLevel[17] == 1) { sendMessage("You start with a automatic 61 Theiving"); addSkillXP((308288), 17); } else; { sendMessage("You already have 61 theiving, you do not gain anything.."); sendMessage("You Teleport to the @red@~Ardougne theving area~"); sendMessage("Theive the Stalls for EXP and some Moneyz"); sendMessage("This area is still in @red@BETA, @blu@Please report any Bugs using ::suggest."); addSkillXP((0), 17);}{ }

Help would be greatly appreciated.

Read full topic
